game.title: The Ancient Treasure
game.description: Embark on a dangerous adventure to uncover the long-lost ancient treasure that holds unimaginable power.
game.reward: 10,000 gold coins and a legendary weapon

task.description: Visit the old library in the town of Thalos and search for the ancient map that leads to the treasure's location.
Journey through the treacherous Forgotten Forest to reach the entrance of the hidden cave where the treasure awaits.
Battle against the ancient guardians protecting the treasure, proving your worth and determination to claim it.

location.#text: The heart of the cave, where the legendary ancient treasure awaits.

task.description: Finally, reach the heart of the cave, where the legendary ancient treasure awaits. Claim it as your own!
